lead_paragraph: Chelsea racked up a fourth consecutive league win without conceding a goal as they outclassed Southampton with strikes from Eden Hazard and Diego Costa at St Mary's on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Beat Southampton With Hazard and Costa on Target
headline.main: Chelsea Beat Southampton With Hazard and Costa on Target

snippet: Chelsea racked up a fourth consecutive league win without conceding a goal as they outclassed Southampton with strikes from Eden Hazard and Diego Costa at St Mary's on Sunday....
